fullplot: Sullivan is a successful, spoiled, and naive director of fluff films, with a heart-o-gold, who decides he wants to make a film about the troubles of the downtrodden poor. Much to the chagrin of his producers, he sets off in tramp's clothing with a single dime in his pocket to experience poverty first-hand, and gets some reality shock.
plot: A director of escapist films goes on the road as a hobo to learn about Life...which gives him a rude awakening.
title: Sullivan's Travels
